CustomField.formula: IF( PFE_REmaining__c < CCL_vs_M2M__c , "Use PFE Remaining for the next deal's PFE calculation" , "Use CCL less M2M for the next deal's PFE calculation")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When reviewing how much Contigent Credit Limit (CCL) is still available you need to look both at the PFE remaining or CCL - M2M. If the PFE remain is greater than the CCL-M2M then it means that M2M is greater thena the combined PFE's.
CustomField.label: What to Use - PFE or M2M
